name: Deep Pinken Magic
description: Deep Pinken Magic new escape game from Ajaescapegames. its good to have you back, this is all about magical situation, its about finding yourself solving this magical clues, you are to find a set of clues and solve some puzzles given, the key here is finding the magical wand and you would to find get something from the magical wand by using it, if you like to know what you will get from the magical wand, find yourself with the wand, lets see what you can get from the magic wand. have fun playing Ajaescapegames and have fun.
